Values.name: Big Joe's Gun Shack
Values.dialogue_text: A burly Agrinaut gestures towards the racks of weapons for sale.
Values.look_text: The neon glow of a <> illuminates your scanners.

Values.name: Kelp Splicing Facility
Values.dialogue_text: The facility is crawling with industrial vehicles and large mechanical splicers. Looks like there are a few maintenance ports.
Values.look_text: Smog from a <> radiates through the area.

Values.name: Starport
Values.dialogue_text: The busy <> is blinking with activity. Trade vessels constantly come and go. Comms light up with public chatter.
Values.look_text: A slowly rotating <> orbits a nearby system.

Values.name: Space Station
Values.dialogue_text: An industrial <> has plenty of maintenance ports to stop at.
Values.look_text: A blinking <> is built into a nearby asteroid.

Values.name: Scrap Trawler
Values.dialogue_text: The worn down <> is almost completely rusted over. Spare parts and cables seem to hold the thing together.
Values.look_text: A rusty <> makes its way through.

Values.name: Trade Vessel
Values.dialogue_text: A cybernetic Artificer greets you over the comms. Looks like he has some tech to unload.
Values.look_text: An Artificer <> cruises through broadcasting offers

Values.name: Trade Vessel
Values.dialogue_text: A cybernetic Artificer greets you over the comms. Looks like he has some tech to unload.
Values.look_text: An Artificer <> cruises through broadcasting offers

Values.name: Kelp Poacher
Values.dialogue_text: The shady <> looks like he might have a deal for you.
Values.look_text: A <> darts through trying to avoid detection.
